title: 110+ Ways to Answer the "I Go Crazy For" Prompt on Hinge

steps.title: Craft a fun reply that showcases your personality or green flags.
steps.content: Craft a fun reply that showcases your personality or green flags. steps.content: Drop a cheeky and daring answer to take things to the next level. steps.title: Do keep your profile positive.
steps.content: Do keep your profile positive. According to dating and relationship coach Suzanna Mathews, you should highlight all the â€œawesome and amazing characteristics that you bring to the table,â€ such as your playfulness or sense of humor. Negativity can turn a lot of people off, and you donâ€™t want to lose a potential match because of a poorly-worded answer. steps.content: Do be honest about your intentions. Itâ€™s important to â€œbe very clear about why youâ€™re on [dating apps],â€ says relationship coach Maya Diamond. [2] X Research source If youâ€™re looking for a situationship , for instance, you might answer the â€œI go crazy forâ€ prompt with a cheeky and daring reply. steps.title: Do include a mix of funny and serious answers.
steps.content: Do include a mix of funny and serious answers. steps.title: Donâ€™t choose common or clichÃ© answers.
steps.content: Donâ€™t choose common or clichÃ© answers. Your Hinge prompt answer is the perfect place to show off your personality, so get creative and come up with a unique response. steps.title: Donâ€™t be too demanding or push gender stereotypes.
steps.content: Donâ€™t be too demanding or push gender stereotypes. While Hinge prompts are supposed to be fun and playful, some people answer them in a way that makes them seem materialistic or shallow. Avoid answering questions in a way that showcases unrealistic standards for a partner, such as listing how tall they should be or how much money they should make. Instead, answer the prompt so it highlights your personality, values, or relationship goals.
